title: Procedure
text: To solve the quadratic inequality, the procedure is as follows. Solve for the roots of the quadratic formula, divide the number line into intervals based on the roots of the quadratic formula, test the values of each interval to see if they are positive or negative, and determine the intervals where the inequality is correct.
speech: To solve the quadratic inequality, the procedure is as follows. Solve for the roots of the quadratic formula, divide the number line into intervals based on the roots of the quadratic formula, test the values of each interval to see if they are positive or negative, and determine the intervals where the inequality is correct.

Solve for the roots of the quadratic formula, divide the number line into intervals based on the roots of the quadratic formula, test the values of each interval to see if they are positive or negative, and determine the intervals where the inequality is correct.

title: Quadratic Roots
text: What are the roots of the quadratic equation? Use ~ for $$\frac{plus}{minus}$$ and i for imaginary numbers in the answer. Write the answer in the form of x1,x2 if applicable as well.
speech: What are the roots of the quadratic equation? Use ~ for  plus over minus  and i for imaginary numbers in the answer. Write the answer in the form of x1,x2 if applicable as well.

and i for imaginary numbers in the answer. Write the answer in the form of x1,x2 if applicable as well.

title: Solution
text: Since we have checked each interval, which ones have positive values in them?
